value.stringValue: Tele-EC MP Chart Review Progress Note

assignments.description: When no Triage Tool is used the Date/Time stamp for Vital Signs will be the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time
assignments.name: PN_Date_Time

assignments.description: When the Triage Tool is used the Date/Time stamp for Vital Signs will be the Clinical Triage Progress Note VCC_Triage_Date__c

constants.description: This constant utilizes the Empty String value to construct a line break for use in formatting of medication, allergy, and problem text screen components
constants.name: lineBreak

decisions.description: Was a Triage Tool used to document Vital Signs?
decisions.name: CT_RN_Triage_Completed
decisions.label: CT RN Triage Completed

decisions.description: If the TUC progress note exists we are going to use it's values to update the vitals information instead of using the CT progress note
decisions.name: Does_TUC_Progress_Note_exist
decisions.label: Does TUC Progress Note exist

decisions.description: When a Case is created Callback Type is selected: VVC, Phone, Chart. Evaluation Type of Evaluation Type to be performed is related to Callback Type. This data will auto populate in the Progress Note creation first screen.
decisions.name: Expected_Evaluation_Type
decisions.label: Expected Evaluation Type

decisions.description: This note checks the choice for Outcome detail and assigns it to a variable for progress note record update purposes
decisions.name: Outcome_Detail_Choice
decisions.label: Outcome Detail Choice

decisions.description: Evaluation Type to determine if creating a Tele-EC MP Virtual Visit Progress Note OR Tele-EC MP Chart Review Progress Note
decisions.name: Type_of_Pogress_Note
decisions.label: Type of Pogress Note
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Tele-EC MP Virtual Visit Progress Note

rules.name: Tele_EC_MP_Chart_Review_Progress_Note

rightValue.stringValue: Tele-EC MP Chart Review Progress Note

rules.label: Tele-EC MP Chart Review Progress Note

Flow.description: From a Tele-EC Case Record Page Medical Providers can create a Tele-EC MP Progress Note OR Tele-EC Chart Review Progress Note Release 1.12.0 Vital Signs Time Stamps Release 1.14.0 Outcomes and Outcome Details Release 1.15.0 Patient verification data in alignment with VHA Directive 1907.09 Release 1.15.0 fix 2393 Chart Consult Release 1.16.0 Add Modality 'CVT' to Medical Progress Notes 1.17.0 PTEMSTUC-2446 Added Variables to capture and concatenate historical Medications, Problems, and Allergies to newly entered values. Added Get Records. Updated the Vitals screen Long text fields. Updated the last Update Records node. 1.19.0 PTEMSTUC-2332 Date/Time will update to current date/time on PN when edited in UI

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Select if Pulse Vital Sign was Observed or Reported
dynamicChoiceSets.name: cPulseMethod

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Select Progress Note Type: Tele-EC Chart Review or Tele-EC MP Progress Note
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TUC_Progress_Note_Type

dynamicChoiceSets.description: TUC Consult outcome after patient assessment.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TUC_ProgressNoteOutcome

formulas.description: This formula takes the allergies that are updated via the lwc in the flow and historic allergies, from the text field that is below the lwc, together.
formulas.name: allergiesCombined

formulas.description:
Concatenates the two medication fields on a CT progress note into one variable, to be viewed on the medications/vitals screen
pseudo: IF both fields are not blank Then concatenate them Else if the first field is blank, then populate the other field else populate the first field
formulas.name: CT_Medications_Concat

formulas.description: When a Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forBloodPressureMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Systolic_Blood_Pressure__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Systolic_Blood_Pressure__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Systolic_Blood_Pressure})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Systolic_Blood_Pressure__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Systolic_Blood_Pressure}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Vital Signs Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(). If Method is Reported Date/Time is Triage Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used. If no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time. If there are no Vitals Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forBloodPressureTimeStamp

formulas.description: When a Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forPulseMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Pulse})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Pulse}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: When a Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forPulseOximetryMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Pulse_Oximetry})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Pulse_Oximetry}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Vital Signs Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(). If Method is Reported Date/Time is Triage Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used. If no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time. If there are no Vitals Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forPulseOximetryTimeStamp

formulas.description: If Vital Signs Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(). If Method is Reported Date/Time is Triage Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used. If no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time. If there are no Vitals Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forPulseTimeStamp

formulas.description: When a Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forTemperatureFMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Temperature})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Temperature}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Vital Signs Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(). If Method is Reported Date/Time is Triage Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used. If no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time. If there are no Vitals Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forTemperatureTimeStamp

formulas.description: When a Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forWeightMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Weight})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Weight}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Vital Signs Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(). If Method is Reported Date/Time is Triage Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used. If no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time. If there are no Vitals Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forWeightTimeStamp

formulas.description: This formula combines the historic and new medications together in order to update the progress note (from the lwc and text field on the Vitals screen)
formulas.name: medicationsCombined

formulas.description: This formula combines the historic and current problems in order to update the progress note. (from the lwc and text field components on the vitals screen)
formulas.name: problemsCombined

Flow.label: Medical Progress Note

recordCreates.description: Create Tele-EC MP Virtual Visit Progress Note
recordCreates.name: Create_Tele_EC_Progress_Note
recordCreates.label: Create Tele-EC Progress Note

recordLookups.description: This Get is used to retrieve 3 field values on the current progress note that was created in this flow. These fields will be used to update the Problems, Allergies, and Medications fields on the Progress note. (Formulas: allergiesCombined, medicationsCombined, problemsCombined)
recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Progress_Note_Infos
recordLookups.label: Get Current Progress Note Infos

recordLookups.description: Retrieves the tele-ec progress note associated with the case that this flow was run from
recordLookups.name: Get_TUC_Progress_Note
recordLookups.label: Get TUC Progress Note

recordLookups.description: When a Tele-EC Progress Note creation is cancelled the "Draft" version of the Progress Note that is saved should default to a PN Tele-EC Record Type
recordLookups.name: GetVirtualVisitRecordType
recordLookups.label: GetVirtualVisitRecordType

recordLookups.description: Get Record Type for Tele-EC MP Chart Review Progress Note
recordLookups.name: MP_Chart_Review_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: MP Chart Review Record Type

recordLookups.description: Get Record Type for Tele-EC MP Virtual Visit Progress Note
recordLookups.name: MP_Virtual_Visit_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: MP Virtual Visit Record Type

recordUpdates.description: Update Flag from True (default value) to False. This field works in the backend for Tele-EC Progress Note Flows, and 'Vital Signs Time Stamp Update' Record Triggered Flow.
recordUpdates.name: Update_IsScreenFlow_Flag
recordUpdates.label: Update IsScreenFlow Flag

screens.description: Progress Note Type and Consult Origin
screens.name: Evaluation_Type_and_Consult_Origin
screens.label: Evaluation Type and Consult Origin

fields.name: Phone_Consent_Disclosure
fields.fieldText:
Telehealth Disclosure:

Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth.

Patient verbal consent obtained.

Location/emergency number confirmed.

validationRule.errorMessage: Consent needs to be obtained before proceeding

fields.name: VVC_Consent_Disclosure
fields.fieldText:
Telehealth Disclosure:

Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth.

Patient verbal consent obtained.

Location/emergency number confirmed.

Environment surveyed and all participants identified.

Virtual conference room locked.

validationRule.errorMessage: Consent needs to be obtained before proceeding

fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: NewProgressNoteConfirmation
fields.fieldText: A new Progress Note has been created.

screens.description: Provide information about a Patient's Vital Signs
screens.name: Tele_EC_MP_Virtual_Visit_Screen_2_Vital_Signs
screens.label: Tele-EC MP Virtual Visit Screen 2 Vital Signs

fields.name: MedicalReconciliationDone
fields.fieldText: Current Medications reviewed with patient/caregiver and reconciliation of medications related to today's visit completed, including non-VA medication and discrepancies, if identified, were addressed. Medication changes and the importance of medication management were reviewed with the patient/caregiver today based on individual needs. Patient/caregiver acknowledged understanding of instructions as stated.

screens.description: Provide information about a Plan, Outcome and Referrals
screens.name: Tele_EC_MP_Virtual_Visit_Screen_3
screens.label: Tele-EC MP Virtual Visit Screen 3

fields.name: PatientVerbalizesUnderstanding_of_the_Care_Plan
fields.fieldText: Patient Verbalizes Understanding of the Care Plan

fields.name: Time_Spent_in_Virtual_Visit
fields.fieldText: Time Spent in Virtual Visit (Enter up to 2 digits to reflect time in Minutes)

validationRule.errorMessage: Please input up to 2 digits to reflect time in Minutes

fields.name: Time_Spent_in_Consultation_Chart_Review
fields.fieldText: Time Spent in Consultation/Chart Review (Enter up to 2 digits to reflect time in Minutes)

validationRule.errorMessage: Please input up to 2 digits to reflect time in Minutes

screens.description: Patient's Current Location (can be an address or a description of a location) and Callback Phone Number
screens.name: TUC_Patient_Location_and_Callback_Number_0
screens.label: Patient Location and Callback Number

fields.name: VeteranName
fields.fieldText:
Veteran's Name: {!Get_Account.FirstName} {!Get_Account.LastName}

SSN: {!Get_Account.HealthCloudGA__TaxId__c}

DOB: {!Get_Account.PersonBirthdate}

fields.fieldText: Veteran's name, SSN, and DOB were verified?

fields.name: Confirmed_Veteran_s_Current_Location_and_Phone_Number
fields.fieldText: Confirmed Veteran's Current Location and Phone Number

fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

textTemplates.description: This template uses the linebreak constants to create a double line space break so the format of the medications, problems, and allergies can be maintained
textTemplates.name: linebreakTemplate

variables.description: This variable holds a text description of all allergies related to the specified progress note
variables.name: Allergy_Info

variables.description: This variable holds the most recent progress note. Where all data will be copied from and onto the flow and new progress note.
variables.name: CT_or_TUC_Progress_Note

variables.description: This variable holds a text description of all medications related to the specified progress note
variables.name: Medications_Info

variables.description: This variable holds a text description of all problems related to the specified progress note
variables.name: Problem_Info

variables.description: Variable to store the current project ID
variables.name: TUC_CurrentCaseRecordID

variables.description: TUC Virtual Visit Record Type to create a Progress Note
variables.name: TUC_VirtualVisitRecordType

variables.description: Variable to be used for Virtual Visit and Chart Consult Progress Notes when a Veteran's Name, SSN, and DOB has been verified, by checking the Caller/Recipient Verified Checkbox in the Patient Location and Callback Number Screen. ** For Chart Consult, value defaulted to False. Current functionality does not include Caller Verification.
variables.name: varCallerVerified

variables.description: The variable will assign a Date/Time value for when Vitals Signs were registered. If a Triage tool was used the Date/Time value will be Triage Date, if not, the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time.
variables.name: varTriage_or_PNDate
